Testifier groans and rolls over. Shokaract watches Sharpedge with glee.
Testifier remembers when Deemos told him about how bad KitKat was. Testifier
fumbles for a gun and aims it at Sharpedge. He falls over before he can
fire. He noticed that his commlink was on.

"I'm sorry." He whispers. He bleeds to death and dies. Shokaract is pleased
and scurries up to Sharpedge.

"Well done, I can see great things in your future!" Shokaract says.

"Sorry? How pathetic!" Rizopas says. Stronghold and Blender drop Deemos into
a CR Chamber.

OOC: Zardus, Granite and Testifier can both go on the deceased list, killed
by Sharpedge, okay?...

Subject: Re: Killing the traitor...


> :::Sharpedge:::
>
> Sharpedge: Fine, but i get to torture him!
> ::He brings Testifier into the dungeon::
> Sharpedge: You know im not gonna letcha off that easily, right?
> ::He takes out his sword and starts swiping at him through the bars::
>
>
